explanation: [0-0] A man and a woman are sitting at a table with their right hands on their faces. The man is wearing a blue hoodie and the woman is wearing a purple hoodie with an orange bow on her head. There is a transparent container filled with water in front of them.

[0-4] A pair of hands carrying a wooden cutting board appears from the left. On the board are four white balls of different sizes. The woman in purple opens her mouth wide, quickly reaches out to grab the biggest ball, and then reaches out to grab the second ball on the left and places it in front of her. The man in blue takes the two balls on the right and looks helplessly at the balls in front of the woman in purple. The woman in purple shakes her head happily.

[4-11] Then, the man in blue puts a white ball into the water with his right hand. The white surface of the ball melts away, revealing a green fruit. The woman in purple opens her mouth and smiles, raising her right index finger to point at the fruit. Then the man in blue picks up a white ball with his left hand and puts it into the water, again revealing a green fruit. The woman in purple points her right thumb at the man and smiles happily with her mouth open. The man in blue takes the green fruit out of the water and puts it on the table, his mouth slightly open and a helpless expression on his face.
